entries.journal_entry_description: Chief Kerritamba and his people can feel the very soul of their beloved forest. The birth of a new tree or plant brings them great joy and death brings them great sadness. The forest is dying, tainted by an unknown source, an intangible evil,  and it causes great sorrow to the Wookiees of Kerritamba village. A cure must be found and it is up to you to find it and save the forest.
entries.journal_entry_title: Search for the Cure: Part I
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Lastly, Chief Kerritamba requires a sample from the haunting creature, the Urnsori's. The sample, in its purest form, can only be found on an Urnsori's egg which are heavily guarded.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: In order to continue with his experiments, Chief Kerritamba requires a Nak'tra Crystal from the Myyydril Caverns.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The Myyydril Caverns can be found north and across the river from the Kerritamba village. Chief Kerritamba needs a Luilris Mushroom to conduct his experiments.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You have collected everything the Chief asked you for, you should return to him in the village.
